extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to Authorized Personnel
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that access to the FieldPort SFP50 and related devices is restricted to authorized personnel only.

extracted_playbook.title: Use FieldPort SFP50 in Secure Environment
extracted_playbook.description: Operate the FieldPort SFP50 only within a secure environment to minimize exposure to potential threats.
